description: Try our easy to follow Sausage & Lentil Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sausage & Lentil Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion, tomatoes, lentils and water to the pan. Stir until mixture comes to the boil. Cover pan and cook for 2 minutes. Spoon into shallow bowls. Garnish with parsley. Serve with broccoli.
